document.full_text: mrs. mccormack ran for president in 1976 and 1980, doing well enough to become the first woman to qualify as a candidate for federal financing and secret service protection.
document.title: ellen mccormack, anti-abortion presidential candidate, dies at 84
lines_and_colors: mrs. mccormack ran for president in 1976 and 1980, doing well enough to become the first woman to qualify as a candidate for federal financing and secret service protection.
